body_html: That's great that you can reproduce a form of this problem. I posted a script that triggers a hang in #1579, and you replied that it didn't hang on your system. I had actually only tested it on my MacBook. I just tried on Linux, and it didn't hang. So if you only tried on Linux, it might also be worth trying on a Mac.
body_text: That's great that you can reproduce a form of this problem.  I posted a script that triggers a hang in #1579, and you replied that it didn't hang on your system.  I had actually only tested it on my MacBook.  I just tried on Linux, and it didn't hang.  So if you only tried on Linux, it might also be worth trying on a Mac.
body: That's great that you can reproduce a form of this problem.  I posted a script that triggers a hang in #1579, and you replied that it didn't hang on your system.  I had actually only tested it on my MacBook.  I just tried on Linux, and it didn't hang.  So if you only tried on Linux, it might also be worth trying on a Mac.
